attributes.action: scrap the plans to force ISP's to ban downloaders of shared media.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People in the UK who go online and illegally download music and films may have their internet access cut under plans the government is considering.

A draft consultation suggests internet service providers would be required to take action over users who access pirated material via their accounts.

Broadband firms which failed to enforce the rules could be prosecuted, and the details of customers suspected of making illegal downloads made available to the courts.

rejection.details: No such proposals have been put forward.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
